nodes.text: The Last Jedi: Rose and Finn's Secret Mission

The Last Jedi: Rose and Finn's Secret Mission is a young-readers storybook based on the film Star Wars: The Last Jedi. It was written by Ella Patrick with art by Brian Rood and was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on December 15, 2017. Retailer Target released an exclusive hardcover edition with two The Last Jedi poster inserts.
Finn and Rose rally for the Resistance in this film tie-in storybook.
